content: ऋद्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Prosperous, thriving, rich; ऋद्धापणं राजपथं स पश्यन् <ls>R. 14. 30</ls>, <ls n="R. 14.">85</ls>; <ls n="R.">2. 50</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 40</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 6</ls>; splendidly furnished; मंदिरं <ls>Ku. 7. 55.</ls> {@--2@} Increased, growing. {@--3@} Stored (as grain). --द्धः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. --द्धं {@--1@} Increase, growth. {@--2@} A demonstrated conclusion; distinct result.
